author: aandvalenzuela
body:
Changes needed to set ROOT632 IB.

See also new `IB/CMSSW_14_1_X/root632` branch (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/tree/IB/CMSSW_14_1_X/root632) in `cmsdist` repo  (changes in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/blob/IB/CMSSW_14_1_X/root632/root.spec).
New branch for `cms-sw/root` at https://github.com/cms-sw/root/commits/cms/v6-32-00-patches/8f5c2cf5cd.

@smuzaffar, should we build for `aarch64` too?
title: Set up IB for ROOT v6.32
